JUDGES: Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Snejana Botoucharova;Volodymyr Butkevych
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the city of ORG . He is a former share - holder ( PERCENT of shares ) and the head of the board of the joint stock company “ Donservispak ” ( hereinafter “ Donservispak ” ) .
ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE ORG ( hereinafter “ the Public Prosecutor ” ) instituted criminal proceedings against the applicant on charge of theft of collective property ( LAW of DATE ) . The allegation was that from DATE to DATE the applicant ’s university studies as well as service charges for his apartment were met by PERSON , causing it UAH CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( MONEY ) damage .
On DATE ORG issued an indictment . The applicant was obliged not to leave the place of his permanent residence .
On DATE the investigator of ORG office ordered the applicant ’s dismissal from his position .
On DATE the investigation was suspended as the applicant was ill .
On DATE the investigation was resumed and a witness was questioned . On DATE the investigator suspended the proceedings as the applicant was in hospital .
On DATE the investigator of ORG office put the applicant on the list of wanted persons .
On DATE ORG quashed this decision as unsubstantiated .
On DATE the Deputy Public Prosecutor extended the time - limit for the pre - trial investigation .
On DATE the investigator of ORG office suspended the proceedings because the applicant could not be found at his permanent residence . ORG of the ORG was ordered to find the applicant .
On DATE the prosecutor of ORG office quashed this decision on the ground that the investigator had not taken all procedural measures that could be accomplished in the applicant ’s absence .
On DATE the investigator of ORG office suspended the proceedings in view of the applicant ’s absence .
On DATE the applicant presented himself to ORG office and the proceedings were resumed .
On DATE the applicant was informed that the pre - trial investigation had been completed .
On DATE the criminal proceedings against the applicant were terminated as no crime had been committed .
On DATE the senior prosecutor of ORG office quashed this decision and remitted the case for additional investigation .
On DATE the investigator ordered an accountant ’s report , the results of which were received by ORG office on DATE .
On DATE ORG issued a new indictment under LAW , relating to charges of abuse of position .
On DATE the applicant was arrested . He was released DATE . He was obliged not to leave the place of his permanent residence .
On DATE the criminal case was transferred to ORG of Donetsk ( “ the PERSON Court ” ) .

DATE and DATE CARDINAL out of CARDINAL hearings were adjourned due to the applicant ’s failure to appear before the court , CARDINAL due to the applicant ’s and ORG failure to appear before the court , CARDINAL due to the applicant ’s illness , and CARDINAL due to the witnesses and/or the prosecutor ’s failure to appear before the court .
On DATE ORG convicted the applicant and imposed a suspended sentence of CARDINAL years’ imprisonment .
On DATE the applicant lodged a cassation appeal and on DATE the case - file was transferred to ORG ( hereinafter “ the ORG ” ) .

On DATE ORG returned the case - file to the first instance court for rectification of procedural shortcomings ( the applicant , his representative and the prosecutor had not been informed about the date of hearing before ORG ; the applicant had not been provided with a copy of the judgment ) .
On DATE the case - file was transferred to ORG .

On DATE ORG returned the case - file to the first instance court for rectification of procedural shortcomings ( the civil party , PERSON , had not been informed about the date of hearing before ORG and had not been provided with the copy of the cassation appeal ) .
On DATE the case - file was transferred to ORG .
On DATE the ORG ( former ORG , hereinafter “ the ORG ” ) , following the applicant ’s request , appointed forensic book - keeping examination , which was terminated on DATE .
On DATE ORG returned the case - file to the first instance court for rectification of procedural shortcomings ( PERSON had not been informed about the date of hearing before ORG ) .
On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of DATE and acquitted the applicant .
On DATE the Deputy Public Prosecutor lodged a cassation appeal .
On DATE the hearings were resumed before ORG .
On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of DATE and remitted the case to ORG .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s appeal and partially modified the judgment of DATE . The applicant was convicted and a suspended sentence of CARDINAL PERSON imprisonment was imposed LAW .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s cassation appeal against this ruling .

On DATE the applicant addressed ORG with a request to calculate the pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage caused by his criminal prosecution and by alleged violations of the law committed by officials of ORG office and courts .
On DATE the court decided not to deal with the request because the applicant had failed to comply with the formal requirements . It allowed the applicant time to rectify the shortcomings .
On DATE the applicant ’s request was returned as had not lodged a rectified version . The applicant did not appeal against this ruling .
On DATE the applicant lodged a claim with ORG asking for compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage caused by his criminal prosecution and the alleged violations of the law .
On DATE the court found that the claim fell outside its jurisdiction . The applicant lodged a cassation appeal against this ruling . There is no information about the outcome of the proceedings .
In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings against ORG office and ORG for compensation for pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage caused by the prosecution .
ORG decided not to deal with the claim because the applicant had failed to comply with the formal requirements . It allowed the applicant until DATE to rectify the shortcomings .
On DATE the same court returned without examination the applicant ’s claim for failure to rectify the mistakes . The applicant did not appeal against this ruling .
On DATE ORG , upon the claim of the public prosecutor in the interest of ORG of ORG , annulled the rent contract of ORG ’s office and ordered its eviction .
On DATE the Deputy President of ORG upheld this decision .
On DATE ORG , upon the motion of ORG of ORG in GPE , declared PERSON bankrupt .
On DATE the same court terminated the bankruptcy proceedings and ordered the liquidation of ORG
On DATE the applicant ’s appeal against this ruling was returned without examination for failure to comply with the formalities . The applicant did not pursue the proceedings .
